name: multisynth
description: Welcome to MultiSynth! A collaborative Synth application.

scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:client" "npm run start:server"
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.install: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install

author: xylloz
